```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

read data, change date column data type
```{r}

library(tidyverse)

data <- read_csv("MIL_50years_R.csv") 

as.Date(data$DATE, format = "%m-%d-%y")


inflow <- data %>% 
  filter(SENSOR_TYPE == "INFLOW")
as.Date(inflow$DATE, format = "%m-%d-%y")

outflow <- data %>% 
  filter(SENSOR_TYPE == "OUTFLOW")
as.Date(outflow$DATE, format = "%m-%d-%y")

release<- data %>% 
  filter(SENSOR_TYPE == "REL SCH")
as.Date(release$DATE, format = "%m-%d-%y")

storage<- data %>% 
  filter(SENSOR_TYPE == "STORAGE")
as.Date(storage$DATE, format = "%m-%d-%y")



```



test run?
```{r}


plot <- ggplot(data = inflow)+
  geom_point(aes(x = DATE, y = VALUE, 
                 alpha = 0.5))+
  geom_smooth(aes(x = DATE, y = VALUE, color = "#00AFBB"))+
  theme_minimal()+
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,50000))

plot


```
